name: Arena (itch) (rexwave)
description:
Walk: Arrow Keys Left or Right

Jump: Space Bar

Jab: D

Dash Attack: Shift

The Dash Attack has a counter at the top in blue, charges back up 1 count every 3 seconds since last use. Jump on their heads for some damage!

Score multiplier increases by 2 every time a wave is cleared before the timer. If a wave is not cleared, multiplier returns to 1.

My first game ever.  Created to test out the Godot Engine, and exporting for HTML5. Just something to put as some content on my page, and as a point to look back on. Thanks for checking it out!
